# WED 2021

URL: http://www.unesco.agh.edu.pl/aktualnosci/wed-2021/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:40:09

World Engineering Day: Engineering for Sustainable Development
March 04, 2021; We start on 10.15 am
On-line,  MS Teams platform
This day is celebrated each year on March 4 to highlight the achievements of engineers and engineers in the modern world and to improve public understanding of how engineering and technology play a key role in modern life and sustainable development.
Welcome
Introduction
Panel discussion
Discussion
Participants from: Chad Republic, Cuba, India, Mali, Poland, UK,
For registration and participation please contact: barbara.kapela@agh.edu.pl
Registration deadline: 02.03.2021
Organizators:
UNESCO AGH Chair;
